issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A patch for this issue has been uploaded to JIRA by a contributor.
status.name: Patch Available

fields.description: GraphiteSink uses tag values as part of metric path using the format like "...tag1=value1.tag2=value..." but the "=" is not allowed by newer version of Graphite. I addition, there are tag values containing white spaces.
fields.summary: Fix issues of metric path emmitted by GraphiteSink

comments.body:
I added 001 which addresses

* replacing whitespace in tag values with "_"
* adding {{tags_kv_separator}} option to specify key value separator for tags
* adding {{tags_add_all}} option to specify add or not all tags

I set the default values of {{tags_kv_separator}} and {{tags_add_all}} as it retain current behaviour.

If {{tags_add_all}} is set to false, GraphiteSink only uses tags provided by {{MsInfo}} which provides basic information such as hostname and process name.

I configured HDFS and Accumulo server to send Graphite metrics to Prometheus' graphite_exporter. Confirming many failed entries for lines  "dfs.FSNamesystem.Context=dfs.HAState" logged to its console. Is it possible to have this patch re-reviewed? Thank you.
